message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the analysis of texts and their network structures, which is a common topic in computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of a generalized similarity measure to compare texts also involves machine learning techniques and data mining (cs.SI, cs.LG). The paper also mentions the traditional term frequency-inverse document frequency (tf-idf) approach, which is commonly used in information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper discusses the role of individual words in the network structure of texts, which could be relevant to the study of complex networks (cs.CY).
